description: This file defines the CatalogProvider class, which manages catalog data including books and categories. It provides methods to load the home page data and perform search queries, utilizing services for API communication and notifying listeners of data changes.

classes.name: CatalogProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages catalog data such as books and categories, providing methods for loading and searching data.

methods.name: CatalogProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializing the CatalogService with an ApiClient.

methods.name: loadHome
methods.description: Fetches categories and books for the home page, updating internal state and notifying listeners.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search query for books based on a query string, updating internal state and notifying listeners.
